text: Nyzhnie Lozove (; ) is a village in Bakhmut Raion (district) in Donetsk Oblast of eastern Ukraine, at 61.8 km NE from the centre of Donetsk city. The settlement was taken under control of pro-Russian forces during the War in Donbass, that started in 2014. ==Demographics== In 2001 the settlement had 11 inhabitants.
